backend/main.mo: Implements session management, events, scoreboard updates, and flag handling for the backend actor.
backend/migration.mo: Migrates old session/event data to the new format adding flag overlays and flagEvent fields.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides human-written summaries for many frontend components, hooks, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark theming across the app.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for landing, broadcast, viewer join, and viewer watch pages using FootballLayout.
frontend/src/components/broadcast/Footba: Provides broadcaster game controls with a dialog for submitting flag events including team selection and reason.
frontend/src/components/broadcast/Permis: Displays camera permission or hardware error messages with a retry button.
frontend/src/components/broadcast/Scoreb: Provides UI for editing scoreboard scores and icons and sending updates via mutation.
frontend/src/components/broadcast/Sessio: Displays the session code with a copy-to-clipboard button.
frontend/src/components/events/EventFeed: Renders a scrollable list of game events with icons and timestamps.
frontend/src/components/events/FlagAnnou: Shows a centered overlay announcing a flag event with team and reason.
frontend/src/components/events/LatestEve: Displays a temporary top overlay highlighting the most recent event.
frontend/src/components/layout/FootballL: Page layout with header, footer, branding, and social links.
frontend/src/components/scoreboard/OnCam: Renders an on‑camera bottom scoreboard bar with team icons and scores.
frontend/src/components/scoreboard/Score: Card wrapper component for scoreboard sections with title and optional icon.
frontend/src/components/system/Unsupport: Displays a warning card when the browser lacks required broadcasting features.
frontend/src/components/viewer/ViewerVid: Shows video container with different states for waiting, live, ended, or unknown sessions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to authentication state and invalidates dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useBroadcasterSession: Manages broadcaster session lifecycle including generating codes, starting, and ending sessions.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using Dfinity AuthClient, including login, logout, and identity state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls with React Query hooks for session validation, session lifecycle actions, and fetching events, metadata, and scoreboard data.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionCode.ts: Stores and manages the viewer's session code in React state synced with localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionLifecycle.t: Computes session lifecycle state (waiting, live, ended, unknown) from metadata and loading state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode overrides, and custom utilities for scoreboard and broadcast visuals.
frontend/src/lib/teamIcons.ts: Provides team icon metadata and a helper to lookup icon info by enum value.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/BroadcasterPage.tsx: UI and logic for broadcasters to start/end sessions, manage camera, control scoreboard, and display live overlays and event feeds.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page offering navigation to start broadcasting or join a viewing session.
frontend/src/pages/ViewerJoinPage.tsx: Allows viewers to enter and validate a session code, storing it and navigating to the viewer page on success.
frontend/src/pages/ViewerWatchPage.tsx: Viewer watch page that loads session data, displays the video player with event/flag/score overlays, and shows an event feed with a leave-session button.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, extended theme colors, container settings, custom animations, and typography/container-query/animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the live-streaming app’s purpose, architectural notes, known issues, and an enumerated list of existing features.
